incidents.name: Twilio Group Rooms - Degraded Services

incident_updates.body: Twilio Group Rooms was degraded for 3 minutes between 7:01 and 7:04 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced symptoms such as interrupted calls and low video or audio quality. The issue has now been resolved.

incident_updates.body: The issue of creating video rooms via API has been resolved. Video Rooms via API is operating normally at this time.

A subset of customers might continue receiving 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. We will provide another update in 72 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
